headings.name: Archivo Black
headings.usage: Use for all H1-H3 headers. Uppercasepreferred for impact.

body.name: Manrope
body.usage: Use for all body text, UI elements, and prices.

scale.h1: text-6xl md:text-8xl tracking-tighter uppercase font-extrabold leading-none
scale.caption: text-xs uppercase tracking-[0.2em] font-semibold text-muted-foreground

rules: NO GRADIENTS. Use solid, bold colors.
Use Accent Red (#DC2626) ONLY for CTAs and Sale tags.
Background must be predominantly WHITE for the store.
Use pure black (#000) or very dark grey (#0A0A0A) for typography.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-24 for sections.
layout.grid_system: Use 'Bento' style grids. Avoid uniform 3-column grids where possible. Use spans.
layout.border_radius: rounded-none (0px) for a sharp, premium street look. Buttons can be slightly rounded (rounded-sm) or pill (rounded-full) but containers must be sharp.

product_card.style: Minimal. No border. Full bleed image.
product_card.hover: Scale image slightly (scale-105). Show quick add button.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-black/90 rounded-none h-12 px-8 uppercase tracking-widest text-sm font-bold transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-black border border-black hover:bg-black hover:text-white rounded-none h-12 px-8 uppercase tracking-widest text-sm font-bold transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-black hover:text-accent uppercase tracking-widest text-sm font-bold

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-black/20 focus:border-black rounded-none px-0 py-4 text-lg placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

navigation.desktop: Minimal top bar. Logo left, Links center, Icons right.
navigation.mobile: Sticky bottom bar (Home, Search, Cart, Profile) + Hamburger for menu.

components.product_card: Aspect ratio [3/4]. Image covers 85% of height. Text below: Brand (tiny) -> Name (Bold) -> Price. No 'Add to Cart' visible until hover (desktop) or persistent icon (mobile).

motion.hover_effects: Image zoom, Text underline slide, Button fill
motion.marquee: Use react-fast-marquee for 'NEW DROPS' or 'WORLDWIDE SHIPPING' banners.

images.strategy: High contrast, studio lighting or urban street. Models should look confident/moody. Product shots must be crisp.

instructions_to_main_agent: Update index.html to include Google Fonts: Archivo Black and Manrope.
Configure Tailwind with the custom colors and font families provided.
Build a 'Layout' component that wraps the app with Lenis scroll.
Create a 'ProductCard' component that is reused everywhere.
Use 'sonner' for all notifications (Added to cart, etc).
Ensure the 'Cart Drawer' slides in from the right with a smooth spring animation.
For the Landing Page, use a 'Bento Grid' layout for the 'Trending' section.
Keep the Navbar transparent on top of the Hero, then solid white on scroll.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. DO NOT use generic placeholders.
Ensure 'data-testid' is added to all interactive elements.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Do not use rounded corners > 4px. Prefer 0px.
Use 2x more whitespace than you think is necessary.
Never center text unless it is a massive H1 hero headline.
Interactive elements must have a clear hover state (change color, underline, or scale).
